main event: On 18 October 1967, two shiny discs were observed hovering approximately 50 feet off the ground in Corpus Christi, Texas.
interesting points: The observer sighted a ruby red object approximately 6 feet in diameter., The objects were observed hovering about 1/4 mile away., After about 5 minutes, the objects shot straight up and were lost to sight within 2 seconds., No physical evidence was reported and a Geiger counter showed no increase in radiation., A Form 117 was sent to the observer but it was not returned.
witness description: The observer described the objects as shiny and ruby red.
